nodes.excerpt: We're excited to present a nice update of Bobby, the iPhone app that helps you keep track of your subscriptions. One of the often requested feature has now been added; Categories! You can now group subscriptions to categories in Bobby like Personal and Work.
nodes.title: Bobby 3.5 - Keep track of your subscriptions, now with categories
nodes.author: Vince Schwidder

localize.description: 我们很高兴为您介绍Bobby的一个很好的更新，这个iPhone应用可以帮助您跟踪您的订阅情况。其中一个经常被要求的功能现在已经被添加了；分类！你现在可以在Bobby中把订阅的内容按照类别进行分组，比如说，你可以把订阅的内容按照类别进行分类。你现在可以在Bobby中对订阅进行分类，比如个人和工作。
localize.tagline: 跟踪您的订阅，现在有了分类。

localize.description: 我們很高興爲您介紹Bobby的一個很好的更新，這個iPhone應用可以幫助您跟蹤您的訂閱情況。其中一個經常被要求的功能現在已經被添加了；分類！你現在可以在Bobby中把訂閱的內容按照類別進行分組，比如說，你可以把訂閱的內容按照類別進行分類。你現在可以在Bobby中對訂閱進行分類，比如個人和工作。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤您的訂閱，現在有了分類。

nodes.excerpt: Greg is a simple app that will coach you to grow healthy, happier plants. ⠀ Greg uses insights from plant physics to train machine learning algorithms so you know when to water each of your plants, in whichever environment they’re in.
nodes.title: Greg 🌱 - Grow healthy and happier plants
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Greg是一款简单的应用程序，它将指导你种植健康、快乐的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理学的见解来训练机器学习算法，这样你就能知道什么时候给你的每一株植物浇水，无论它们在什么环境中。
localize.tagline: 种植健康和快乐的植物

localize.description: Greg是一款簡單的應用程序，它將指導你種植健康、快樂的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理學的見解來訓練機器學習算法，這樣你就能知道什麼時候給你的每一株植物澆水，無論它們在什麼環境中。
localize.tagline: 種植健康和快樂的植物

nodes.excerpt: Get inside the minds of top Product Leaders from Netflix, Amazon and Spotify with these templates covering the nine most common Product Management scenarios — presented by Product School, MURAL and Coda.

nodes.excerpt: Antistalker is a free Android app that notifies you when other apps are using the camera or the microphone of your device. Compared to other similar apps, lets you know which application used your cam or mic and for how long.
nodes.title: Antistalker - Alerts you when the mic or cam  of your phone is in use
nodes.author: mariankh

localize.description: Antistalker是一款免费的Android应用，当其他应用使用你设备的摄像头或麦克风时，它会通知你。与其他类似的应用程序相比，让你知道哪个应用程序使用了你的摄像头或麦克风，以及使用了多长时间。
localize.tagline: 当你的手机的麦克风或摄像头正在使用时，会向你发出警报。

localize.tagline: 當你的手機的麥克風或攝像頭正在使用時，會向你發出警報。

nodes.excerpt: Habio allows you to dive into the very nature of your habits through psychological exercises, CBT-based reflection journal and timely reminders adjusting to lifestyle goals. Habio is a perfect tool to help you improve your daily routines step by step.

nodes.excerpt: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
nodes.title: Pacaso - The modern way to buy and own a second home
nodes.author: Sarah Wright

localize.description: 我们在这里帮助您体验二手房所有权的乐趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花费1/8的成本就能拥有一套二手房，同时避免了传统置业的麻烦。我们会帮您找到最合适的房子。您决定您想拥有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 现代人购买和拥有第二套住房的方式。

localize.description: 我們在這裏幫助您體驗二手房所有權的樂趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花費1/8的成本就能擁有一套二手房，同時避免了傳統置業的麻煩。我們會幫您找到最合適的房子。您決定您想擁有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 現代人購買和擁有第二套住房的方式。

nodes.excerpt: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.
nodes.title: PriceBlocs - Accept payments online with just a link
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: 随时随地在线接受支付，无需编码。PriceBlocs通过我们超低摩擦的支付链接帮助您在任何渠道完成更多的销售。只需点击几下就能接受Apple Pay和Google Pay。
localize.tagline: 只需一个链接就能在线接受付款

localize.description: 隨時隨地在線接受支付，無需編碼。PriceBlocs通過我們超低摩擦的支付鏈接幫助您在任何渠道完成更多的銷售。只需點擊幾下就能接受Apple Pay和Google Pay。
localize.tagline: 只需一個鏈接就能在線接受付款

nodes.excerpt: Join the internet in making the Ever Given stuck in other areas outside of just the Suez Canal. You can even make the boat to scale.
nodes.title: Ever Given Ever Ywhere - Get the Ever Given stuck wherever you want 🚢
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: 加入互联网，让Ever Given号卡在苏伊士运河以外的其他地区。你甚至可以按比例制作这艘船。
localize.tagline: 让Ever Given卡在你想要的地方🚢。

localize.description: 加入互聯網，讓Ever Given號卡在蘇伊士運河以外的其他地區。你甚至可以按比例製作這艘船。
localize.tagline: 讓Ever Given卡在你想要的地方🚢。
